pages.text: $(li)Emeralds are green gemstones that can be rarely found and mined in Caves or found in Loot Chests.$(br)$(li)Evokers, Executioners, Hobgobs, Mimics, Ogres, Pillagers, Trickets, or Vindicators may drops Emeralds when they are slayed.
$(li)Villagers will trade you interesting items in exchange of Emeralds and viceversa.$(br)$(li)Emerals can be used to craft an Emerald Armor, a Speaker Block, and an Advancement Frame too.
